0502.name: TRANSPORT_CONNECTION_FAILURE
0502.message:
Could not connect to the server. 

Please try again later.
0502.short_description: Couldn't connect to the Friends server.
0502.long_description: There was a problem connecting to the Friends server. This is most likely due to the servers being unstable or overloaded.
0502.short_solution: The Friends server is most likely unstable or overloaded. If this issue persists, please check the server status for maintenance, or try again later.
0502.long_solution: The Friends server is most likely unstable or overloaded. If this issue persists, please check the server status for maintenance, or try again later.
